column1: Here begins the story of the life of @entity7. @entity7's father was @entity2. @entity2's father was@entity3. @entity3's father was @entity8. And @entity8's father was @entity10. These Five men had ruled @entity9 forthe last One hundredZero years. For the last Twenty years, @entity7 had been the ruler. When @entity2 died, @entity7became the ruler. In these last Twenty years, @entity7 brought lots of good luck to hispeople. They had never eaten so well. Most of his people ate Three meals a day. Recently, @entity7had been having trouble with a band of troublemakers led by @entity4. @entity7 chose to dowhatever he could to get rid of @entity4. So, he got @entity0 to get rid of @entity4. @entity6 sneaked into @entity4's bedroom and did away with him. With the bad man gone,all the people had a giant party and sang a song about the greatness of their ruler.
